summary: This is an email chain from November 12, 2019, regarding Deutsche Bank's internal investigation into Jeffrey Epstein's accounts. The bank plans to contact former employees, including Paul Morris, for interviews. The recipients acknowledge the notification and have no concerns.

persons.name: Parvin Moyne
persons.context: Sends an email informing colleagues that Deutsche Bank's internal investigation will involve reaching out to former employees, including Paul Morris, to discuss Epstein's accounts.

persons.name: Thomas Moyer
persons.context: A recipient of the email who is copied on the communication regarding the bank's internal investigation into Epstein's accounts.

persons.name: Joseph DiPiero
persons.context: A recipient of the email who is copied on the communication regarding the bank's internal investigation into Epstein's accounts.

persons.name: Paul Morris
persons.context: Identified as a former Deutsche Bank employee whom the bank plans to contact as part of its internal investigation into Jeffrey Epstein's accounts.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of Deutsche Bank's internal investigation regarding his accounts at the bank.

connections.description: Colleagues communicating via email about a bank investigation.
Colleagues communicating via email about a bank investigation.
Moyne is involved in an investigation that plans to contact former employee Morris.
Morris is a former bank employee being sought for information regarding Epstein's accounts.

events.title: Deutsche Bank Internal Investigation Update
events.description: Deutsche Bank employee Parvin Moyne informs colleagues that the bank's internal investigation into Jeffrey Epstein's accounts will involve reaching out to several former employees for interviews.

keyFacts: Deutsche Bank was conducting an internal investigation into Jeffrey Epstein's accounts as of November 2019.
The investigation planned to interview former Deutsche Bank employees, including a person named Paul Morris.
The email communication shows internal coordination and notification about the investigation steps among bank staff.
